benchmark_details.name: COIG-P (Chinese Open Instruction Generalist - Preference)
benchmark_details.overview: COIG-P is a high-quality, large-scale Chinese preference dataset comprising 1,006k preference pairs generated using LLMs, aimed at aligning LLMs with human values in the Chinese context.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive Chinese preference dataset that enhances the performance of LLMs in aligning with human values.

data.source: Generated via LLMs from crawled and filtered Chinese queries.
data.annotation: Automatically generated using a pipeline with no human intervention.

methodology.calculation: Scores based on LLM-generated responses compared to human evaluations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with human preferences.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance compared to other existing Chinese preference datasets.
methodology.validation: Results validated through comparison with AlignBench.
